item.description: You can either park in my drive way (entry Langdon Street) or on Langdon / Laudholm Street. If you want to come by public transportation, the Newtonville Commuter Rail station is very close by and the Newton Center Green Line Station a short Busride away, as well as the Watertown Yard on Watertown Square. Depending on the attendance and interest level I'd be willing to pickup groups from any of those locations.
item.how_to_find_us: It's my home and I'll be the only one there :-)
item.why: Well, if you want to find fellow gamers and socialize or just meet nice people.
item.name: Fellowship Gathering
